Content:
Hello from Prince Edward Island. I just bought a 78 FLH trike with an aluminum flat head 6 Corvair engine, 4 carbs (only 2 hooked up) with a VW rear end
The wheelie bars are not for show. They are needed. My question is can I weight the front, and if so, how? And yes I know I am crazy.
